javadoc.text: * Unit upper triangular banded matrix. The same storage as{@link no.uib.cipr.matrix.LowerTriangBandMatrix LowerTriangBandMatrix}, but * the main diagonal is assumed to be all ones. It is still allocated, however.

javadoc.param: nSize of the matrix. Since the matrix must be square, this * equals both the number of rows and columns
kdNumber of bands above the main diagonal (superdiagonals)
AMatrix to copy contents from. Only the parts of A * that lie within the allocated band are copied over, the rest * is ignored (including main diagonal entries)
kdNumber of bands above the main diagonal (superdiagonals)
AMatrix to copy contents from. Only the parts of A * that lie within the allocated band are copied over, the rest * is ignored (including main diagonal entries)
kdNumber of bands above the main diagonal (superdiagonals)
deepTrue for a deep copy. For shallow copies, A * must be a banded matrix
